comments:
Eclipse 20020305-I


I don't know how to cause this error to happen.  All I can say is you need to 
<g> work on a feature for a couple of weeks, lovingly hand crafting the code, 
adding new classes, modifying many many other classes </g> and then when you 
commit your changes you get the following error included below.
In addition to the error log, some changes were released and others weren't.  I 
had deleted a file (a dll) and then imported a new version that I was 
releasing.  The dll was removed from the repository and the new one was not 
added.

I issued the commit from the top of the project.
After the failure, when I synchronized, the things which had been released 
appeared as conflicts and the things which hadn't were still waiting to be 
released.  The only exception was the dll file which appeared as a conflict but 
the HEAD stream actually had no such file.


Log: Fri Mar 08 12:13:38 EST 2002
